description:
The bookstore is visited by all kinds of customers, some of whom like books, and some of whom love bookstores.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bookstores Are So Wonderful! / The Shelves with and Without Restrictions
Hon`ya Haiizo / Haitte Ii Tana Dame na Tana / Sore Ike! Azarashi-san: Hisoka naru Yabou
ホンヤハイイゾ / 入っていい棚 だめな棚 / それいけ! アザラシさん~密かなる野望~
